Entries.fall_11.000: I gotta go get a checkup today... Great.$7
Entries.fall_11.002: I just got out of the clinic. Completely healthy and vigorous, just as I expected.$h
Entries.fall_11.001: I'm fine, really. No need to probe.

Entries.marriage_Mon.001: Vincent keeps calling me, asking if we can hang out. I think that's his way of saying he misses me.$h

Entries.marriage_Fri.000: Don't tell, but I really just came over for a free lunch.$h
Entries.marriage_Mon.000: Vincent seems okay. A little *too* energetic, maybe. Otherwise good.

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Hey, you ever think about who else in town would be good as a couple?#$e#Heh... now that I'm married I'm trying to get everyone else married too.

Entries.spring_12: Are you excited for tomorrow's festival?
